title: Happy locomotive
creator_credit: Stephen Fitzgerald, Baltimore and Ohio Railroad Company and Unifilm
brief_description: An animated film describing the dangers which confront an engine driver. Many of the hazards are caused by unthinking people, children and vandals. Accidents could be avoided if the public remembered simple safety rules.
creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Fitzgerald, Baltimore and Ohio Railroad Company and Unifilm
